STATE v. PETERSON No. COA04-573 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed May 3, 2005. Certification Date May 23, 2005. Appeal from the New Hanover (02CRS18448, 02CRS18449, 02CRS18450, 02CRS18451, 02CRS18452, 02CRS20446, 02CRS20447).

Case reported without published opinion. No error.
